name: Stand-Up India
description: Financing SC/ST and Women Entrepreneurs for setting up greenfield enterprises in manufacturing, services, or trading.
benefits: Loans from ₹10 Lakh to ₹1 Crore.
Composite loan covers 75% of project cost.

name: PM Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY) - STT
description: Skill development for school/college dropouts or unemployed youth.
benefits: Industry-relevant skill training.
Certification and placement assistance.

name: Biotechnology Ignition Grant (BIG)
description: Invests in innovative biotech ideas from ideation to Proof of Concept.
benefits: Grant-in-aid up to ₹50 Lakhs.
Mentorship and incubator access.

name: Marketing Incentive - Handloom
description: Promotes marketing channels for handloom products to ensure better remuneration for weavers.
benefits: Financial incentive for marketing.
Greater visibility for handloom products.

name: PM Virasat ka Samvardhan (PM VIKAS)
description: Socio-economic empowerment of minorities through skilling, training, and education.
benefits: Women leadership training.
Education for school dropouts.

name: Venture Capital Fund for SC
description: Concessional finance for SC individuals to promote entrepreneurship.
benefits: Investment from ₹10 Lakh to ₹15 Crore.
Support as Debt or Equity.

name: Coir Udyami Yojana
description: Modernization of the coir industry and generation of rural employment.
benefits: Credit-linked subsidy for coir units.
Working capital assistance.

name: PM Vishwakarma
description: Holistic support to traditional artisans and craftspeople in scaling up products.
benefits: Skill upgradation and toolkit incentive.
Collateral-free credit support.

name: Samriddhi (SC/ST Startup Scheme)
description: Assistance for SC/ST students to launch their own business after/during education.
benefits: One-time financial assistance of ₹20 Lakhs.
Mentorship for student startups.

name: Agri-Clinics And Agri-Business Centres (AC&ABC)
description: Supplements public extension by providing services to farmers through business models.
benefits: Training for agri-entrepreneurs.
Bank loan and subsidy for agri-units.

name: Mahila Samriddhi Yojana
description: Micro-financing for empowerment of women from economically backward areas.
benefits: Loans at nominal interest rates.
Support for small goals and independence.

name: ESDP - Entrepreneurship & Skill Development
description: Organized to nurture the talent of youth by enlightening them on industrial activities.
benefits: Industrial activity training.
Assistance for setting up MSMEs.

name: PM-MKSSY (Fisheries Sector)
description: Formalization of fisheries microenterprises and facilitating access to working capital.
benefits: Institutional working capital finance.
Small grants for stakeholders.

name: Assistance to State SC Corporations
description: Economic development assistance to SCs below poverty line through credit facilitation.
benefits: Share capital and margin money loans.
Subsidies for employment schemes.

name: PRISM (Innovation Scheme)
description: Promotes innovations in individuals, start-ups, and MSMEs for model fabrication.
benefits: Support up to ₹20,00,000/- for fabrication.
Assistance for patenting and tech transfer.

name: ASIIM - Ambedkar Social Innovation
description: Boosts entrepreneurship among SC students and differently-abled youth for tech ideas.
benefits: Equity funding support.
Hand-holding and incubation support.

name: New Swarnima Scheme for Women
description: Term loan scheme for women entrepreneurs from backward classes.
benefits: Loan up to ₹2,00,000/- at 5% interest.
Social and financial security for BC women.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme-2
description: Promotes apprenticeship training by providing stipend support to apprentices.
benefits: Partial stipend support from Government.
Capacity building of apprenticeship ecosystem.

name: PM SVANidhi
description: Micro-credit scheme for street vendors to provide collateral-free working capital loans.
benefits: Loan up to ₹50,000 incrementally.
7% interest subsidy on timely payment.

name: SITARE-GYTI Award Grant
description: Funding for innovative student projects with commercial potential in biotech.
benefits: Funding up to ₹15 Lakhs per project.
Support for creating biotech startups.

name: Sub-mission on Breed Development of Livestock and Poultry
description: Focussed on enhancing per-animal productivity and genetic improvement in livestock and poultry through financial aid for breeding.
benefits: Financial assistance for setting up parent farms and hatcheries.
Support for breed improvement and quality control.

name: Marketing Development Assistance (MDA) - Tourism
description: Supports travel agents and tour operators for the promotion of Indian tourism in international markets.
benefits: Financial aid for overseas marketing and publicity.
Assistance for participating in international tourism fairs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Bhartiya Janaushadhi Pariyojana
description: Provides generic medicines at affordable prices through dedicated outlets (Janaushadhi Kendras).
benefits: Incentives up to ₹5 Lakhs for opening a store.
Additional ₹2 Lakhs for Women/SC/ST/Northeast entrepreneurs.

name: Export Oriented Production: Large Cardamom Nursery
description: Focuses on quality improvement and export promotion of spices by helping farmers set up certified nurseries.
benefits: Financial subsidy for nursery units.
Technical training for cardamom quality control.

name: Micro Credit Finance (NSFDC)
description: Direct micro-loans to SC entrepreneurs for income-generating units costing up to ₹1,40,000.
benefits: Loans at very low interest rates.
Collateral-free micro-credit for self-employment.

name: PLI Scheme for White Goods (AC and LED)
description: Incentivizes manufacturers of AC and LED components to boost domestic manufacturing and reduce imports.
benefits: 4% to 6% cash incentive on incremental sales.
5-year support for component manufacturing.

name: UNNATI - Industrial Transformation Scheme
description: Special industrialization scheme for the Northeast region to boost manufacturing and services.
benefits: Capital investment incentive.
Insurance reimbursement and interest subsidy.

name: General Term Loan (GTL) for Safai Karamcharis
description: Financial assistance for any income-generating activity for Safai Karamcharis and their families.
benefits: Loan support up to 90% of the project cost.
Highly concessional interest rates for the marginalized.

name: Relief for PoK/Chhamb Displaced Families
description: Central assistance provided as a one-time settlement for families displaced from PoK and Chhamb.
benefits: Financial grant of ₹5,49,692 per family.
Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) to the head of the family.

name: PMKVY - Special Projects
description: Targeted skill development for groups and projects that require customized training modules.
benefits: Skill training in non-conventional roles.
Career counseling and placement support for the marginalized.

name: National Handicrafts Development Programme: EMPORIA
description: Financial aid for setting up permanent emporia in urban areas for marketing handicraft products.
benefits: Marketing platform in prime urban locations.
Assistance for interior work and rent for emporia.

name: Mahila Coir Yojana
description: Focuses on providing training and subsidised coir processing machinery to rural women.
benefits: Stipend during training.
75% subsidy on spinning and processing machinery.

name: Coir Industry Technology Upgradation (CITUS)
description: Aims to modernize the coir industry through technical upgradation and machinery support.
benefits: Capital subsidy for machinery.
Assistance for setting up quality control labs.

name: MSME Sustainable (ZED) Certification
description: Encourages MSMEs to adopt Zero Defect Zero Effect practices through certification and rewards.
benefits: Certification fee subsidy (Micro: 80%, Small: 60%, Medium: 50%).
Incentives from Banks and Government for high ratings.

name: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme (SISFS) - For Startups
description: Direct financial aid for early-stage startups for product development and market trials.
benefits: Grant up to ₹20 Lakhs for POC/Prototype.
Loan/Equity up to ₹50 Lakhs for commercialization.

name: Membership Fee Reimbursement in E-Commerce Portals
description: Reimburses the entry/membership fee for SC/ST MSMEs to join digital marketplaces.
benefits: 100% reimbursement of portal fees.
Helps marginalized entrepreneurs access online trade.

name: Technology Development Fund (TDF) - Defence R&D
description: Aims to promote self-reliance in the Defence sector by supporting R&D in MSMEs and startups.
benefits: Project funding for innovative defence tech.
Collaboration opportunities with DRDO and military.

name: Telecom Technology Development Fund (TTDF)
description: Grant-based support for designing and commercializing telecom products like 5G and Chipsets.
benefits: Financial grants for chipset and hardware design.
Support for field trials in rural and remote areas.

name: Export Promotion Capital Goods (EPCG) Scheme
description: Facilitates import of capital goods at zero duty for enhancing manufacturing competitiveness for exports.
benefits: Zero customs duty on imported machinery.
Supports the export of quality goods and services.

name: Fund of Funds for Startups (FFS)
description: Indirect funding mechanism where the government invests in startups through Venture Capital funds.
benefits: Access to government-backed equity funding.
Helps startups scale through professional AIFs.

name: Swachhta Udyami Yojana
description: Financial assistance for Safai Karamcharis and Manual Scavengers to procure sanitation-related vehicles for waste management.
benefits: Loans for vacuum loader trucks and garbage collection vehicles.
Concessional interest rates and financial training.

name: Sanitary Marts Scheme
description: Assistance for setting up a one-stop-shop (Sanitary Mart) for all sanitation-related products and services.
benefits: Contributory loan for setting up shops.
Help in creating income-generating avenues in sanitation.

name: Rubber Plantation Development (MTFP)
description: Aims to increase natural rubber production through accelerated new planting and replanting on scientific lines.
benefits: Financial assistance for new planting/replanting.
Technical guidance for rubber growers.

name: Coir Vikas Yojana - Export Market Promotion
description: Aims to improve the export performance of the Indian Coir Sector through marketing activities and global promotion.
benefits: Support for international exhibitions and fairs.
Financial assistance for exporting coir products.

name: PRISM (Category-1): Proof of Concept
description: Supports individual innovators to achieve inclusive development through prototypes and proof of concept models.
benefits: Financial support for green technology and clean energy prototypes.
Grant up to ₹2 Lakhs to ₹20 Lakhs.

name: Innovations for Defence Excellence (iDEX)
description: Engages startups and MSMEs to foster innovation and technology development in the Defence and Aerospace sector.
benefits: Grants for R&D and technology development.
Mentorship and adoption of innovation in Armed Forces.

name: MSE Exporters Capacity Building (IC Scheme)
description: Reimburses various costs incurred by first-time MSE exporters on export shipments to build global capacity.
benefits: Reimbursement of shipment costs.
Assistance for market entry for small exporters.

name: IC Scheme - Market Development Assistance
description: Facilitates participation of MSMEs in international exhibitions, fairs, and buyer-seller meets abroad.
benefits: Reimbursement of stall rent and airfare.
Exposure to international markets and seminars.

name: Testing Fee Reimbursement Scheme (SC/ST)
description: A sub-scheme under NSSH that reimburses testing fees for SC/ST MSMEs to ensure product quality.
benefits: 100% reimbursement of laboratory testing fees.
Supports quality compliance for small businesses.

name: Incubation Scheme (MSME)
description: Supports untapped creativity and promotes the adoption of latest technologies at the proof-of-concept level.
benefits: Capital and financial support for validation of ideas.
Plant and machinery support for innovative startups.

name: Export Promotion Council Membership Reimbursement
description: Provides reimbursement of annual membership fees paid by SC/ST MSEs to various Export Promotion Councils (EPC).
benefits: 100% reimbursement of entry and subscription fees.
Facilitates access to export-related network and data.

name: Special Credit Linked Capital Subsidy (SCLCSS)
description: Provides 25% capital subsidy to SC/ST MSEs for procurement of plant & machinery through institutional finance.
benefits: Direct capital subsidy for technology upgradation.
Facilitates modernization of SC/ST-owned units.

name: Breed Development for Rural Poultry (Entrepreneurship)
description: Supports rural poultry farming through 50% capital subsidy for establishing Parent Farms and Hatcheries.
benefits: Capital subsidy for brooder cum mother units.
Incentivizes commercial poultry farming in rural areas.

name: PLI Scheme for Automobile and Auto Component Industry
description: Aims to enhance India’s manufacturing capabilities for Advanced Automotive Products through performance-linked incentives.
benefits: Incentives on sales of electric and hydrogen-fuel vehicles.
Encourages global supply chain integration.

name: Recognition of In-House R&D Units
description: Grants formal recognition and registration to in-house R&D units established by the corporate industry.
benefits: Customs duty waiver for R&D equipment.
Income tax benefits for innovative research activities.

name: Scheme of Fund for Regeneration of Traditional Industries (SFURTI)
description: Makes traditional industries more productive and competitive through cluster development and interventions.
benefits: Financial aid for setting up Common Facility Centres (CFC).
Soft and hard interventions for artisans.

name: Design Scheme Under MSME Innovative
description: Enables MSMEs to avail expert advice on product design and development for enhancing their product portfolio.
benefits: Grant for product design projects.
Direct mentorship from experienced designers.

name: Bank Loan Processing Fee Reimbursement (SC/ST)
description: Reimburses the processing fee charged by banks for sanctioning business loans to SC/ST entrepreneurs.
benefits: 100% reimbursement of processing fees or ₹1 Lakh limit.
Financial relief for marginalized entrepreneurs.

name: Bank Guarantee Charges Reimbursement Scheme (SC/ST)
description: Reimburses the bank guarantee charges for SC/ST MSMEs to enhance their participation in tenders.
benefits: Reimbursement of performance bank guarantee charges.
Helps SC/ST entrepreneurs meet tender requirements.

name: PRISM (Category-2): Fabrication & Trial
description: Supports innovation projects requiring fabrication of working models, patenting, and technology transfer.
benefits: Funding for working models and process know-how.
Financial assistance for trial runs and patenting.

name: PM Formalisation of Micro Food Processing Enterprises (PMFME)
description: Supports the upgradation and formalization of micro food processing enterprises through credit-linked subsidies and technical support.
benefits: Credit-linked capital subsidy at 35% of the project cost.
Support for common infrastructure, branding, and marketing.

name: Intellectual Property Right (IPR) Scheme - MSME Innovative
description: Provides financial and legal support to MSMEs for filing patents, trademarks, and copyrights to protect their innovation.
benefits: Reimbursement of patent/trademark filing fees.
Assistance for setting up Intellectual Property Facilitation Centres.

name: Credit Enhancement Guarantee Scheme for SC
description: Provides credit guarantee to Scheduled Caste entrepreneurs to help them access loans for setting up business enterprises.
benefits: Financial guarantee for loans taken by SC-led companies.
Enables easier access to capital for high-growth sectors.

name: Startup India Seed Fund - For Incubators
description: Provides grants to incubators to offer seed funding to startups for prototype development and market entry.
benefits: Grants up to ₹5 Crores to eligible incubators.
Supports startups at very early stages through professional incubators.

name: National Startup Awards
description: Recognizes and rewards outstanding startups and ecosystem enablers building innovative and scalable products.
benefits: Cash prize and national recognition.
Opportunity for networking with investors and government bodies.

name: Promotion of Piggery Entrepreneurship
description: Supports pig farming entrepreneurship by providing capital subsidy for establishing breeder farms.
benefits: One-time capital subsidy up to ₹30 Lakhs.
Supports the establishment of modern piggery units.

name: Genetic Improvement: Pig Semen Collection Lab
description: Financial assistance for establishing semen collection and processing labs to improve indigenous pig productivity.
benefits: Grants for setting up labs at government and private farms.
Reduces inbreeding and improves animal productivity.

name: Modified Market Development Assistance (Khadi)
description: Aims to enhance Khadi production and sales through technology upgradation and market promotion.
benefits: Incentives to Khadi artisans and Karyakartas.
Financial support for Khadi institutions to upgrade machinery.

name: Khadi Karigar Janashree Bima Yojana
description: A group insurance scheme for Khadi artisans providing cover against death and disability.
benefits: Insurance cover for normal and accidental death.
Support for disability and social security for artisans.

name: URBAN HAAT - Infrastructure Support
description: Aims to set up permanent marketing infrastructure in urban cities for artisans and weavers to sell directly to customers.
benefits: Direct marketing facilities for handicrafts.
Elimination of middlemen and increased artisan income.

name: Advance Authorisation (AA) Scheme
description: Enables duty-free import of inputs for export production, helping manufacturers enhance global competitiveness.
benefits: Zero customs duty on imported raw materials for export goods.
Reduces manufacturing cost for exporters.

name: GROUP WORKSHED SCHEME
description: Facilitates the establishment of worksheds for powerlooms to provide scale of economy for business operations.
benefits: Subsidies for construction of industrial sheds/worksheds.
Supports weavers in operating more efficient machinery.

name: Assistance to Training Institutions (ATI)
description: Assistance for creation and expansion of training infrastructure under the Ministry of MSME.
benefits: Financial support for new branches and training centres.
Strengthens entrepreneurship training ecosystem.

name: Consortia & Tender Marketing Scheme
description: Helps MSMEs participate in large government tenders by forming consortia to execute orders collaboratively.
benefits: Facilitates participation in large tenders.
Joint marketing and brand building support for small units.

name: Term Loan (TL) for SC Entrepreneurs
description: Provides financial support in the form of term loans for Scheduled Caste category entrepreneurs for starting companies.
benefits: Loans for industrial and service sector projects.
Concessional rates for SC-led societies and companies.

name: Import of Exotic Pig Germplasm
description: Supports the import of high-quality pig germplasm for genetic upgradation and enhancing meat productivity.
benefits: Access to international genetic stocks.
Enhances livestock meat quality for exports.

name: National Livestock Mission: Breed Development (General)
description: Comprehensive mission for breed development across various livestock sectors in India.
benefits: Capital subsidies for entrepreneurs.
Technical assistance for rural farming models.

name: UP Startup Policy 2020
description: A comprehensive framework to support tech-startups in UP through sustenance allowances and seed capital.
benefits: Sustenance allowance of ₹17,500/month for 1 year.
Seed funding up to ₹5 Lakhs.
Patent filing reimbursement up to ₹2 Lakhs.

name: Mukhyamantri Yuva Swarozgar Yojana
description: Promotes self-employment among educated youth of UP by providing subsidized loans for industries and services.
benefits: Loans up to ₹25 Lakhs (Industry) / ₹10 Lakhs (Service).
25% margin money subsidy by state govt.

name: One District One Product (ODOP) Margin Money Scheme
description: Financial assistance for artisans and entrepreneurs working on district-specific traditional products.
benefits: Financial grant from 10% to 25% of project cost.
Support for marketing and global branding of local products.

name: Mukhyamantri Gramodyog Rozgar Yojana
description: Focuses on rural entrepreneurship by providing loans for setting up village industries.
benefits: Loans up to ₹10 Lakhs for rural units.
Interest subsidy for SC/ST and Women entrepreneurs.

name: UP Information Technology & ITeS Policy
description: Support for software companies and IT startups setting up operations in Uttar Pradesh.
benefits: Capital interest subsidy and electricity duty exemption.
Reimbursement of lease rentals for IT entities.

name: Mahila Samarthya Yojana
description: Empowers women entrepreneurs by providing support for cluster development and marketing.
benefits: Assistance for setting up Common Facility Centres (CFC).
Training and branding support for women-led groups.

name: Vishwakarma Shram Samman Yojana
description: Supports traditional artisans like carpenters, tailors, and goldsmiths with skill training and advanced toolkits.
benefits: 6 days free skill training.
Free advanced toolkit for the specific trade to start a business.

name: UP Food Processing Industry Policy 2023
description: Incentivizes the establishment of food processing units to bridge the gap between farmers and markets.
benefits: Capital investment subsidy up to 35% (Max ₹5 Crores).
Interest subsidy for a period of 5 years.

name: Mukhyamantri Bunkar Soure Urja Yojana
description: Assistance for weavers to adopt solar power for their powerlooms to reduce operational costs.
benefits: Subsidy up to 50% for general and 75% for SC/ST weavers for solar plants.
Solar inverter and battery support for business.

name: UP Electronics Manufacturing Policy
description: Incentives for startups and companies involved in electronic component manufacturing (ESDM).
benefits: Capital subsidy up to 15%.
Interest subsidy on loans for hardware R&D.

eligibility_criteria.geography: Noida / Greater Noida / Yamuna Expressway focus

name: UP Agriculture Export Policy 2019
description: Focuses on boosting exports of agricultural produce from UP through logistics and quality support.
benefits: Transport subsidy up to 25% for air/sea export.
Reimbursement of 50% for international quality certifications.

name: UP Micro-Entrepreneur Accident Insurance
description: Safety net for small merchants and traders in case of unfortunate accidents.
benefits: Accidental death/disability cover up to ₹5 Lakhs.
Social security for family members of the entrepreneur.

name: UP Tourism Policy 2022 (Entrepreneur Focus)
description: Support for entrepreneurs setting up heritage hotels, homestays, or tourism-related services.
benefits: Subsidy up to 25% on capital investment.
Support for marketing and branding of tourist spots.

name: UP MSME Promotion Policy 2022
description: A policy providing capital subsidies and tax exemptions to boost the MSME sector, with a special focus on backward regions like Purvanchal and Bundelkhand.
benefits: Capital subsidy up to 25% for micro units.
100% Stamp Duty exemption in Purvanchal and Bundelkhand regions.
Interest subsidy up to ₹25 Lakhs per year for 5 years.

name: Mukhyamantri Shikshuta Protsahan Yojana (CMAPS)
description: A scheme providing internship opportunities and stipends to educated youth in various industries to encourage future entrepreneurship.
benefits: Monthly stipend of ₹2,500 (shared by Govt and Industry).
Industry-recognized training and certificate.
Priority in state self-employment loan schemes after completion.

name: Mini / Micro Dairy Scheme
description: Supports agri-entrepreneurs in setting up dairy units to increase milk production and provide self-employment in rural areas.
benefits: Bank loans for purchasing 2 to 10 cattle units.
Interest subsidy provided by the state government on the loan amount.

name: UP Solar Energy Policy 2022
description: Incentivizes the development of solar energy projects, including rooftop solar and utility-scale solar parks for commercial use.
benefits: 100% Electricity Duty exemption for a period of 10 years.
Capital subsidy for solar plants and commercial setups.
Stamp duty exemption on land purchased for solar projects.

name: UP Warehousing & Logistics Policy
description: Facilitates the creation of high-quality logistics infrastructure and warehouses to support the state's industrial supply chain.
benefits: 75% concession on land conversion charges for logistics use.
Interest subsidy on loans taken for warehouse construction.
Capital subsidy for logistics park infrastructure development.

name: Industrial Plot Allotment for Women
description: Specifically reserves industrial land and provides financial concessions for 100% women-led enterprises in the state.
benefits: 5% to 10% land reservation in industrial areas managed by UPSIDA.
Concessional rates on land allotment and priority processing for women.
